_meanings:
{@--1@} To be bad
or corrupted, be spoiled or suffer
damage.

{@--2@} To be defiled or 
violated (as a woman &c.), be stained, be
or become impure or contaminated;
<ls>Pt. 1. 66</ls>; <ls>Ms. 7. 24</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">9. 318</ls>,  
<ls n="Ms.">10. 102.</ls>

{@--3@} To sin, commit a mistake, be
wrong.
